text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga bella is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Costa Rica.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga bella". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38328A10111941. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38328A10111941.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
